RKB1R.RG.summary: AS Rigas kugu buvetava provides ship repair, ship building, and other services in the Baltic region. It is also involved in the conversion works for various types of vessels, including lengthening, modernization, refurbishment, etc.; and metal construction works. The company was founded in 1913 and is based in Riga, Latvia.
